# pulldownTarget

**Instance Property**

The target object that defines the action you want to perform when someone interacts with the color well.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var pulldownTarget: AnyObject? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Specify a custom action method to replace the system popover and color picker. For a color well with the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColorWell/Style/minimal] or [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColorWell/Style/expanded] style, clicks in the color area normally display a popover with the system color picker.  If you specify a value for this property and the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColorWell/pulldownAction] property, clicks in the color area execute your custom action method instead.

## Customizing the color selection behavior

- **pulldownAction**: The action to perform when someone clicks in the color area of the color well.
